section.title: Finalize installation for openSUSE and SUSE Linux Enterprise

note.para: Default configuration files vary by distribution. You might need to add these sections and options rather than modifying existing sections and options. Also, an ellipsis (...) in the configuration snippets indicates potential default configuration options that you should retain.

section.para: This section applies to openSUSE Leap 42.2 and SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2.

step.para: Edit the /etc/swift/swift.conf file and complete the following actions:

listitem.para: In the [swift-hash] section, configure the hash path prefix and suffix for your environment.
Replace HASH_PATH_PREFIX and HASH_PATH_SUFFIX with unique values.

warning.para: Keep these values secret and do not change or lose them.

listitem.para: In the [storage-policy:0] section, configure the default storage policy:

step.para: Copy the swift.conf file to the /etc/swift directory on each storage node and any additional nodes running the proxy service.
On all nodes, ensure proper ownership of the configuration directory:
On the controller node and any other nodes running the proxy service, start the Object Storage proxy service including its dependencies and configure them to start when the system boots:
step.screen: # systemctl enable openstack-swift-proxy.service memcached.service # systemctl start openstack-swift-proxy.service memcached.service

step.para: On the storage nodes, start the Object Storage services and configure them to start when the system boots:
step.screen: # systemctl enable openstack-swift-account.service openstack-swift-account-auditor.service \ openstack-swift-account-reaper.service openstack-swift-account-replicator.service # systemctl start openstack-swift-account.service openstack-swift-account-auditor.service \ openstack-swift-account-reaper.service openstack-swift-account-replicator.service # systemctl enable openstack-swift-container.service openstack-swift-container-auditor.service \ openstack-swift-container-replicator.service openstack-swift-container-updater.service # systemctl start openstack-swift-container.service openstack-swift-container-auditor.service \ openstack-swift-container-replicator.service openstack-swift-container-updater.service # systemctl enable openstack-swift-object.service openstack-swift-object-auditor.service \ openstack-swift-object-replicator.service openstack-swift-object-updater.service # systemctl start openstack-swift-object.service openstack-swift-object-auditor.service \ openstack-swift-object-replicator.service openstack-swift-object-updater.service
